scripts.start:users-service:3001: cross-env NODE_ENV=users-service PORT=3001 pm2 start src/users-service/index.ts --interpreter ts-node --name users-service-3001
scripts.start:appointment-service:4001: cross-env NODE_ENV=appointment-service PORT=4001 pm2 start src/appointment-service/index.ts --interpreter ts-node --name appointment-service-4001
scripts.start:quote-service:5001: cross-env NODE_ENV=quote-service PORT=5001 pm2 start src/quote-service/index.ts --interpreter ts-node --name quote-service-5001
scripts.start: npm run start:users-service && npm run start:appointment-service && npm run start:quote-service
scripts.restart: pm2 restart users-service-3001 --update-env && pm2 restart appointment-service-4001 --update-env && pm2 restart quote-service-5001 --update-env
